text: Tonie Marshall (November 29, 1951 â€“ March 12, 2020) was a French-American actress, screenwriter, and director. She was born in Neuilly-sur-Seine, France. She was known for her role in A Slightly Pregnant Man. She also directed Venus Beauty Institute and The Missionaries. Marshall died on March 12, 2020 after a long illness in Paris, aged 68. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:French screenwriters Category:French movie directors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American screenwriters Category:American movie directors Category:Actors from Hauts-de-Seine Category:Writers from Hauts-de-Seine Category:People from Neuilly-sur-Seine
title: Tonie Marshall
